title: Drew Barrymore: Rewriting The Story | The Joyful Mayhem of Drew with Chelsea Devantez | 5
description:
This week, Chelsea Devantez — comedian, writer, and host of the Celebrity Book Club podcast — joins Brooke and Aricia to talk about making it in Hollywood, Drew Barrymore’s finest moments, and the art of the celebrity memoir.


Binge the full season early and ad free with Wondery+ in the Wondery App. https://wondery.app.link/eventherich
